Class StreamConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • bs.Connection
      • bs.StreamConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothConnection, SimulatorConnection, StdIOConnection, StdOutConnection

    public abstract class StreamConnection
extends Connection
    A connection over generic input/output streams

      • sendMessage

        public final boolean sendMessage(Message m)
        Description copied from class: Connection
        If connected, sends a message over the connection. Otherwise, does nothing.
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in class Connection
        Parameters:
        m - The message to send
        Returns:
